buildAgents.title: Build Agents
buildAgents.name: Name

alerts.buildAgentPaused: Build agent pause request sent successfully. The agent will not accept new build jobs and will gracefully finish the current build jobs or will cancel them after a configurable seconds.
alerts.buildAgentResumed: Build agent resume request sent successfully. The agent will start accepting new build jobs.
alerts.buildAgentsPaused: Pause request sent to all build agents. The agents will not accept new build jobs and will gracefully finish the current build jobs or will cancel them after a configurable seconds.
alerts.buildAgentsResumed: Resume request sent to all build agents. The agents will start accepting new build jobs.

buildAgents.pauseAllWarning:
You are about to pause all build agents. This will prevent them from processing any new build jobs.
Are you sure you want to proceed?
